Class Game

extends java.lang.Object

      • moveEnemies

        public void moveEnemies()
        Method for moving all the Enemy present in the game. If they are outside the window, then they are added to the deletion list to be deleted in due time. This is to avoid memory overload.

      • createTower

        public boolean createTower​(java.lang.String towerName,
                           int x,
                           int y,
                           int radius)
        Method for creating a tower with coords (X, Y).
        Parameters:
        towerName - Tower type selected
        x - Cell X of the Tower
        y - Cell Y of the Tower
        radius - circle radius of the Tower
        Returns:
        true if the creation is OK else false

      • createEnemies

        public void createEnemies()
        Method to create a Enemy if the spawning process is not finished

      • createTowers

        public void createTowers()
        Method of creating a Tower and putting it on standby for processing.

      • createLaser

        public Laser createLaser​(Tower t,
                         Enemy e)
        Method of creating a Laser.
        Parameters:
        t - Tower which is shooting
        e - Enemy who is being shoot
        Returns:
        Laser

      • updateGame

        public void updateGame()
        Method for detecting and if necessary adding an enemy, present within the radius of a Tower, to the deletion list while awaiting its treatment.

      • manageEnemies

        public void manageEnemies()
        Method to remove from the Game the Enemy to be deleted and add the created Enemy.

      • manageLasers

        public void manageLasers()
        Method to remove from the Game the Laser to be deleted and add the created Laser.

      • delLasers

        public void delLasers()
        Method to clean the view from all lasers displaying

      • checkNextWave

        public void checkNextWave()
        Method to move on to the next Wave if all enemies have been killed and the wave is over.

      • gameFinnish

        public boolean gameFinnish()
        Method for detecting whether the game is over.
        Returns:
        true if the Game is finnish else false
